DaisyAD_Approach.synopsis: As the player approaches entrance of Moonrise Tower, Daisy warns them they are getting close to the source of the Absolute..

Guard1.synopsis: Guard who stops you at the entrance to Moonrise Towers.
Guard1.how_to_trigger: loadlevel SCL_Main_Ateleport S_MOO_EntranceGuard_001choose field optionspeak with Malik

Ghoul1.synopsis: Trianglehead ghoul at the entrance to Moonrise TowerInclusion will only trigger once on one of the three ghouls (so the inclusion on all three should be the same.)

individual_metadata.synopsis: In this dialogue the player attempts to enter moonrise WITHOUT the drider. The guard mindmelds with player, senses their tadpole, and gladly lets them into the towers, telling them to report to Disciple Z'rell (Zuh-rELL).

AD_Ghouls.synopsis: Two ghouls patrol near the entrance of Moonrise. They have beef with the winged ghouls higher up on the exterior of the tower. They (very roughly) talk about their dislike for the winged chouls.
AD_Ghouls.how_to_trigger: Load SCL_Main_AGo to -138; 21; -144Wait for ADs to trigger

AD_Guards.synopsis: The two guards at Moonrise entrance kill time wile on duty.
AD_Guards.how_to_trigger: Load SCL_Main_Agoto -152; 22; -133Stand around as they talk

Ghoul3.synopsis: Trianglehead ghoul at the entrance to Moonrise Tower.Inclusion will only trigger once on one of the three ghouls (so the inclusion on all three should be the same.)

AD_Guard001Greeting.synopsis: The guard at the entrance of Moonrise welcomes the player when they return (after already been formally greeted).
AD_Guard001Greeting.how_to_trigger: Load SCL_Main_Agoto -152; 21; -98Walk to the entrance of MoonriseComplete dialogWalk into town (far enough away to leave Moonrise)Return to Moonrise entrance

Drider.synopsis: Player arrives at Moonrise Tower with the drider.https://docs.google.com/document/d/11ofonJmDnosKsHlpOAejRRQ_lbzwimo8nMFIjcSUkYo
Drider.how_to_trigger: - Load SCL_Main- Debug book: Act 2 set up - Absolute path- Talk to Cultists at 103, -50, Summon the Drider- Follow the drider through the SCL to the Harpers ambush (at 9, -18)- Side the with the cultists in combat- Continue following the Drider to the Moonrise entrance (at -149, -130)- Approach the guards(Teleport to trigger location (86, -45) and activate trigger, pass Harper ambush and follow Drider to Moonrise. Auto triggers on proximity.)

Guard2.synopsis: Guard who stops you at the entrance to Moonrise Towers.
Guard2.how_to_trigger: loadlevel SCL_Main_Ateleport S_MOO_EntranceGuard_001choose field optionspeak with Merim

Ghoul2.synopsis: Trianglehead ghoul at the entrance to Moonrise TowerInclusion will only trigger once on one of the three ghouls (so the inclusion on all three should be the same.)

DaisyAD_Approach_0.text: We're close. I can feel it - the Absolute. Its power is strong here.

Ghoul1_0.speaker: Lae'zel
Ghoul1_0.text: A mere shadow of a creature - yet it hears the Absolute's voice?

Ghoul1_3.speaker: Shadowheart
Ghoul1_3.text: Barely alive by most standards, and still it bows to the Absolute.

Ghoul1_8.speaker: Karlach
Ghoul1_8.text: Half-dead and still a servant. My worst nightmare.

Ghoul1_9.speaker: Astarion
Ghoul1_9.text: Oh that's grotesque. Don't stare - you'll only encourage it.
Ghoul1_9.context: NodeContext: Seeing an undead ghoul - Astarion is pretty put off by it

Ghoul1_10.speaker: Wyll
Ghoul1_10.text: Ghastly thing - yet loyal to the Absolute.

Ghoul1_2.speaker: Gale
Ghoul1_2.text: A sorry creature. Just enough wits to be able to serve the Absolute.

18.speaker: Zealot Malik
18.context: NodeContext: like a polite nod to a superior

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *His thoughts invade your own, probing for purchase. Your parasite purrs in recognition.*

55.speaker: Zealot Malik
55.text: My apologies. Welcome back, True Soul - what news?
55.context: NodeContext: not deferential - recognising one of equivalent rank to himself

30.speaker: Zealot Malik
30.text: My my - it's you. Disciple Z'rell will be most pleased to meet the person who aided Balthazar. She was delighted to see him return with the Nightsong.

19.speaker: Zealot Malik
19.text: My my - it's you. Disciple Z'rell will be most pleased to meet the person who took down all those Harpers. She was delighted when our scouts reported your victory.
19.context: NodeContext: not deferential - recognising one of equivalent rank to himself

1.speaker: Zealot Malik
1.text: She's in the audience chamber. Go on inside.

47.speaker: Zealot Malik
47.text: Ah, one blessed like myself. What news, True Soul?

16.speaker: Player
16.text: 'Welcome back'? I've never been here before.

34.speaker: Zealot Malik
34.text: My mistake - your mind tastes familiar. Where are you reporting from?
34.context: NodeContext: slightly suspicious -the mind 'taste' is a reference to mind-melding with the player, not literally tasting their mind!

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Grymforge - I ran into some trouble, but I handled it.

40.speaker: Zealot Malik
40.text: Z'rell will be glad to hear it. The scrying eyes only see so much.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: That's for your superiors to know.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Nowhere of importance. What news inside?

42.speaker: Zealot Malik
42.text: General Ketheric's advisor went off on a field trip - Z'rell's in charge 'til he gets back.

12.speaker: Zealot Malik
12.text: Find out for yourself. I think you're just in time for the show.

52.speaker: Adept Merim
52.text: You'll find Z'rell in the audience chamber, True Soul. She'll be wanting to hear from you.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: Our path leads to Z'rell. Let us not keep her waiting.

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.text: Let's hope this Z'rell likes what we have to say.

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: That's what I call an invitation. Let's find Z'rell and get this caravan moving.

9.speaker: Zealot Malik
9.context: NodeContext: as a farewell - equivalent to 'god bless you'

41.speaker: Astarion
41.text: Well then, let's not keep her waiting.

15.speaker: Wyll
15.text: Z'rell - fancy name. Let's put our best foot forward. Or is it best feet?

36.speaker: Gale
36.text: If it's an audience she desires, an audience let us provide.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I infiltrated a group of Harpers at an Inn, out in the shadows.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Surprise - I'm here to take your head.

58.speaker: Zealot Malik
58.context: NodeContext: Getting ready to fight, so sinister edge.

35.speaker: Adept Merim
35.context: NodeContext: Combat is about to start - should have that edge

43.speaker: Zealot Malik
43.text: Did she now? You'll find her inside, although she may not be disposed to welcome you.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: I have a message from Nere. Who should I report to?

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Trouble in the Underdark - but I handled it.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Little from the field. What news inside?

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I might ask the same. Why is one of our rank on guard duty?

32.speaker: Zealot Malik
32.text: Who better to suss out his like?
32.context: NodeContext: Taps head, indicating mindmeld powers

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I've infiltrated an encampment of Harpers protected by a cleric of Selûne.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I've hid in some fetid places in my time - but the land around here really takes the cake.

51.speaker: Zealot Malik
51.text: What need have you of hiding, friend? You need not skulk like a vagrant, this land belongs to us.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Great news: I'm here to take your head.

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *His mind attempts to connect with yours and finds - nothing. You have no tadpole, and no welcome in this place.*

AD_Guards_7.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guards_7.text: I hear we march come first light.

AD_Guards_0.speaker: Adept Merim
AD_Guards_0.text: I'd prefer you to speak sense.

AD_Guards_6.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guards_6.text: Before the Absolute? I was nobody.

AD_Guards_10.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guards_10.text: I'll never get used to seeing that drider scuttling out of the darkness.

AD_Guards_2.speaker: Adept Merim
AD_Guards_2.text: It's not the worst thing out there.

AD_Guards_5.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guards_5.text: Aye. At least it's on our side.

Ghoul3_7.speaker: Ghoul
Ghoul3_7.text: We are favoured. We are... blessed.

Ghoul3_11.speaker: Lae'zel
Ghoul3_11.text: A mere shadow of a creature - yet it hears the Absolute's voice?

Ghoul3_1.speaker: Shadowheart
Ghoul3_1.text: Barely alive by most standards, and still it bows to the Absolute.

Ghoul3_6.speaker: Karlach
Ghoul3_6.text: Yeah, yeah, I'm sure you are.
Ghoul3_6.context: NodeContext: Not too mean. More just like yuo'd say to a child talking nonsense

Ghoul3_3.speaker: Astarion
Ghoul3_3.text: Oh that's grotesque. Don't stare - you'll only encourage it.

Ghoul3_9.speaker: Wyll
Ghoul3_9.text: Ghastly thing - yet loyal to the Absolute.

Ghoul3_0.speaker: Gale
Ghoul3_0.text: To be so favoured and so blessed! One feels positively riddled with envy.
Ghoul3_0.context: NodeContext: sarcastic and with a feeling of repulsion at the same time

AD_Guard001Greeting_0.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_0.text: You brought Balthazar back from the darkness, I hear. The General will be pleased.
AD_Guard001Greeting_0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.

AD_Guard001Greeting_1.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_1.text: The preparations are done - we march for Baldur's Gate. I hope you'll be with us.
AD_Guard001Greeting_1.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.

AD_Guard001Greeting_3.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.

AD_Guard001Greeting_4.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_4.text: The cleric is with General Thorm. You'll be his favourite soon enough.
AD_Guard001Greeting_4.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.

AD_Guard001Greeting_5.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_5.text: Fewer lights in the darkness now.
AD_Guard001Greeting_5.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.

AD_Guard001Greeting_6.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_6.text: Our victory is assured. In Her name.
AD_Guard001Greeting_6.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.

AD_Guard001Greeting_7.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_7.text: Shelter from the shadows a while, true soul.

AD_Guard001Greeting_8.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_8.text: You should report to the throne room. Z'rell likes to greet all true souls on arrival.
AD_Guard001Greeting_8.context: InternalNodeContext: Ketheric is still in private council dealing with some cultists who failed him. Default state on player's first arrival to tower.

AD_Guard001Greeting_9.speaker: Zealot Malik
AD_Guard001Greeting_9.text: General Thorm is in the throne room, passing judgement on some of the troops. Doesn't look good for them.
AD_Guard001Greeting_9.context: InternalNodeContext: Ketheric is still in private council dealing with some cultists who failed him. Default state on player's first arrival to tower.

Drider_33.speaker: Narrator
Drider_33.text: *Your minds connect and you hear a voice whispering to you. The Absolute? Or just the echoes of his fractured mind, reverberating in the darkness?*

Drider_14.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_14.text: A - a True Soul? Why would one of your followers fight with the Harpers, Majesty?

Drider_38.speaker: Player
Drider_38.text: I was trying to infiltrate the Harpers, until you ruined it.

Drider_44.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_44.text: We - we would never! Our Majesty should have said.

Drider_25.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_25.text: We apologise. We never meant to disrupt any plans.

Drider_16.speaker: Zealot Malik
Drider_16.context: NodeContext: with a snort. referring to the drider

Drider_24.speaker: Player
Drider_24.text: 'Welcome back'? I've never been here before.

Drider_18.speaker: Zealot Malik
Drider_18.text: My mistake. Your mind tastes familiar.

Drider_34.speaker: Player
Drider_34.text: What's someone of our rank doing on guard duty?

Drider_41.speaker: Zealot Malik
Drider_41.context: NodeContext: Taps temple, indicating mindmeld powers

Drider_13.speaker: Zealot Malik
Drider_13.text: Best to head in and find out. Should be a good show.

Drider_31.speaker: Adept Merim
Drider_31.text: The General's advisor went off on a field trip - Z'rell's in charge 'til he gets back.

Drider_43.speaker: Zealot Malik
Drider_43.text: She's in the Great Hall. She'll be wanting to see you.

Drider_8.speaker: Adept Merim
Drider_8.text: Disciple Z'rell's in the great hall. She'll be wanting to see you.

Drider_1.speaker: Adept Merim
Drider_1.text: Rest of you - head on in.

Drider_15.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_15.text: The others will go in, but I will go up. My queen summons me to her chapel - to be in her presence.

Drider_27.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_27.text: I hear you, sweet Majesty. I am coming, my queen!
Drider_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: The drider scuttles up the side of Moonrise Tower's wall, toward the roof.NodeContext: Gleeful - religious ecstacy. The queen you're referring to is your god, the Absolute.

Drider_48.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_48.text: We are no fools - we will not be deceived by the likes of you!

Drider_22.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_22.text: They return once more, Majesty. What do they want?

Drider_29.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_29.text: What's this? Who are these, Majesty?

Drider_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The drider leads the player towards the front of Moonrise Tower, a surviving goblin from the ambush marching alongside his spindly legs.

Drider_42.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_42.text: The queen sent them! Her Majesty's flesh grows, full and glorious.

Drider_28.speaker: Brawler Vez
Drider_28.text: Helped us with some Harpers on the way too. They're shadowbait now.

Drider_30.speaker: Zealot Malik
Drider_30.context: NodeContext: Dismissive snort. Looks player over. You're suspicious.

Drider_9.speaker: Narrator
Drider_9.text: *His thoughts seek yours, searching, grasping. Your parasite squirms in recognition.*

Drider_45.speaker: Kar'niss
Drider_45.text: They survived the dark, Majesty! Praise be.

Guard2_0.speaker: Adept Merim
Guard2_0.text: Plenty of supplies if you're running low, True Soul.

Ghoul2_4.speaker: Lae'zel
Ghoul2_4.text: A mere shadow of a creature - yet it hears the Absolute's voice?

Ghoul2_10.speaker: Shadowheart
Ghoul2_10.text: Barely alive by most standards, and still it bows to the Absolute.

Ghoul2_5.speaker: Karlach
Ghoul2_5.text: That right, mate? Only the Absolute?

Ghoul2_3.speaker: Astarion
Ghoul2_3.text: Oh that's grotesque. Don't stare - you'll only encourage it.

Ghoul2_6.speaker: Wyll
Ghoul2_6.text: Ghastly thing - yet loyal to the Absolute.

Ghoul2_11.speaker: Gale
Ghoul2_11.text: Curious. Ghouls aren't exactly known for their religious fervour. Why does this one care for the Absolute?
